title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 459.11 - Use of validation percentages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 459.11 - Use of validation percentages

State Regulations
(a) If it is determined by the above
procedures that at least 75 percent of the participants in the sample have
incomes which do not exceed 90 percent of the State's median income adjusted
for family size, reimbursement to the local districts for payments shall
continue subject to compliance with other provisions of this Part, for the
ensuing 12-month period. If such procedures determined that less than 75
percent of the participants have incomes which do not exceed 90 percent of the

State's median income adjusted for family size, the department shall take
appropriate action in accordance with 45 CFR
228.61. (b) One copy of the summary report shall be
sent to the main office of the local social services district conducting the
validation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
459.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
